Title: Centering
Description: The worm is positioned to the center of its backlash
column4: to prepare for the next movement

Title: Near Overspeed
Description: Starts blinking the more and more rapidly as the speed approaches the :guilabel:`overspeed` threshold setting

Title: Near Underspeed
Description: Starts blinking the more and more rapidly as the speed approaches the 'underspeed' threshold setting
